scripts.build: bun run build:types && bun build src/index.ts --outdir out
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:types && bun build src/index.ts --packages external --outdir out
scripts.build:nocheck: bun run build:types:nocheck && bun build src/index.ts --outdir out --noCheck
scripts.build:packages:watch: concurrently "tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --project tsconfig.json --watch" "bun build src/index.ts --packages external --outdir out --watch"
